entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:38 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 2:30 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.3°C
Wind: W 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Blizzard developing overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 25 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 40 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
